1126 Secretary Sean Duffy: @CAGovernor & his state were caught red-handed after weeks of claiming they did nothing wrong. Now that we’ve exposed their lies, 17,000 illegally issued trucking licenses are being revoked.California must revoke every illegally issued CDL or I will pull $160M in federal funds. posted 5 hours ago by Mr_Rightside 73 comments award share download report block
73 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Elon Just Walked Away – And His Reason Changes Everything Read More Ads by Ad.Style Krat 85 points 5 hours ago Did you get a liberal judges permission to pull that funding ?!? permalink award report block reply Grindelwald 25 points 5 hours ago Waiting for that.
